heroSection.title: Unlimited free shipping and exclusive discounts at thousands of stores in Peru

cards.title: Unlimited free shipping
cards.description: On your orders from restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies, beverages, and more. Enjoy this benefit at your favorite stores.

cards.title: Exclusive Discounts
cards.description: Exclusive discounts at the stores you love and new promotions every week.

bannerSection.title: Unlimited free shipping and exclusive discounts at thousands of stores

promo.disclaimer: * Valid for new Spotify Premium users. Terms and Conditions apply

accordion.title: What should I keep in mind for free or discounted shipping?
accordion.content: Your order must meet the minimum amounts set for both restaurants and markets, payment can be online or in cash, and the delivery must be managed by PedidosYa. Most of the stores available in the app meet these conditions.
